modified sentence to read more clearly and replaced egg link with more intuitive link
rmv speculation - can't be true, as V gives her the painless poison before she expresses remose...
added full name of this film, as "attack of the clones" would not be so widely recognized

/* Books */ Combing sales info on graphic novel into correct section, removing some journalese. Adding some {{fact}} tags

Date maintenance tags and general fixes: build 495:
/* Differences between the film and graphic novel */ Changed my mind. Added back fact-tag and correctly formed another one.
/* Differences between the film and graphic novel */ remove malformed fact-tag. Don't think it's needed and it makes the place look untidy..
/* Comments from political sources */ alter piped link to avoid redirect
/* Modern fears of totalitarianism */ Aligning quotation box
/* Plot */ Trimming plot synopsis and removing some fan fictiony bits. Four paras would be best but it's difficult to cut
/* Differences between the film and graphic novel */ Minor copyedditing, adding some {fact} tags, so get some references for this section - though I do not dispute anything written here

wikipedia is read worldwide, and many countries use $

/* The letter V and the number 5 */fixed anchor link(s), replaced: [[V sign#Winston Churchill and the victory sign|"V for Victory"]] → [[V sign#The V campaign and the victory/freedom sign|"V for Victory"]] using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]

[[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/203.100.212.94|203.100.212.94]] ([[User talk:203.100.212.94|talk]]) to last version by Mclay1
see [[WP:$]] for manual of style regarding currency abbreviations. as this is an entirely US-/UK-related topic, it can simply use "$" (or "£" where appropriate)

Germany and UK don't belong, since all the studios are US. Wikipedia's policies: Insert the company that produced the film. Insert the home country or countries of the film's main production companies
small edits to: US$ as many countries use $, relist alphabetically, and total amount is priority of one single region

update {{cite visual}}: deprected for this use, replaced: {{cite visual | crew=Warner Bros | year=2006 | url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0775408 | title=V for Vendetta Unmasked | medium=TV-Special | location=United States|d using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]

Rv; that is not the only determining factor.
The studios Warner Bros., Virtual Studios, and Silver Pictures are all American studios.
revert; every other film article just uses "Cast", and if there's a "main cast" heading that suggests there's another cast-related section, which there isn't
The Wachowski brothers didn't direct this
/* Plot */ cut down on the length of the plot to comply with [[WP:FILMPLOT]]
revert; this isn't for all the studios that had *anything* to do with the film, just the major players
